item.title: Agree on a single GeoCoordinate class
item.description:
From jjbross@gmail.com on May 27, 2010 19:09:10
We need to agree on a single GeoCoordinate class. It seems that everyone is defining its own class. Several GeoCoordinate classes are scattered across the packages.
Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/issues/detail?id=4

item.contents:
From Frank.Vi...@googlemail.com on May 30, 2010 10:52:50
Can't shouldn't we use this class from within the packages 'server' and 'preprocessing'? If not, we could copy and paste ^^ static int <--> double conversions and a spherical distance function would be fine.

From thilo.mu...@gmail.com on August 11, 2010 00:45:22
Status: Started

From jjbross@gmail.com on February 25, 2011 14:41:29
Ok, I am closing this issue then.
Status: Fixed
